      • save

        public static <T> T save(T dto,

      • save

        public static <T extends IdBasedEntity> T save(IdBasedEntityDto<T> dto,
                                               Class<T> entityClass,
                                               BasicRepository<T> repository)
        Creates or updates an entity based on a DTO passed in. The entity should support an IdBasedEntityDto and work with a BasicRepository.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Entity class.
        Parameters:
        dto - DTO for the given entity.
        entityClass - User class of the final entity (must have a public parameterless constructor).
        repository - Repository in which to persist the entity.
        Returns:
        Persisted entity.
        See Also:
        BasicRepository, BasicRepositoryImpl
